message.content: {"id": "17289", "title": "Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)", "description": "When trying to click on the first Combo in the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog, the Combo does not take focus.", "OB": "Clicking on the first Combo in the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog should result in the Combo taking focus.", "EB": "After clicking on the first Combo in the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog, the Combo should immediately take focus.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. 2. Press the 'Tab' key. Verify that the focus goes to the second Combo labeled 'Repository Path:'."}
